name: Voltdb-jdbc-loader
tagline: A command-line tool to load data into VoltDB from a JDBC source.
body:
### What does it do?
This project can be used to connect to any JDBC database and transfer entire tables into a VoltDB database that has an equivalent table defined.  It works one table at a time, and it assumes that you have already built the equivalent schema in VoltDB.

### Usage
For usage, see the [README](https://github.com/benjaminballard/voltdb-jdbc-loader/blob/master/README.md) file included in the project.

### Authors and Contributors
Ben Ballard (@benjaminballard)
